author: fielding
msg: Until someone has time to create a proxy-specific timeout handler,
we need to use hard_timeout any time we are simultaneously reading
from one blockable buffer and writing to another.

author: fielding
msg: saferead must stop reading if the buffer has been marked in error
(i.e., a timeout has occurred).  Necessary for proxy timeouts.

author: fielding
msg: Fixed problem on Irix with servers hanging in IdentityCheck,
apparently due to a mismatch between sigaction and setjmp.
Reviewed by: Jim Jagielski, Randy Terbush, Dean Gaudet

author: fielding
msg: If Options Includes and USE_PERL_SSI is defined, allow #perl SSI to
Reviewed by: Randy Terbush, Doug MacEachern, Roy Fielding

author: fielding
msg: Initialize r->status as request-timed-out until after we successfully
read the request-line and header fields.
Submitted by: Roy Fielding and Ed Korthof, PR#601
